title.rendered: Lucknow Super Giants Franchise Announced Gautam Gambhir As Their Global Mentor

content.rendered:
Former India opener Gautam Gambhir has been announced global mentor of Lucknow Super Giants by the RP-Sanjiv Goenka group. The group said in a statement that Gambhir will lead their cricketing operations. The 40-year-old, in addition to guiding Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) , will now also mentor RPSG Group’s T20 team in South Africa-Durban’s Super Giants. Under Gambhir, LSG qualified for the play-offs in its debut season.

We are super delighted to announce Mr. Gautam Gambhir as the Global Mentor of our Super Giant family, LSG wrote on Twitter.

Lucknow Super Giants

Read also:Will not go to see India vs Pakistan match in T20 World Cup 2022 in Melbourne, I often get into fights: Ramiz Raja
